long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
ğŸ¥ **Enhance your YouTube experience with video filters!** ğŸ¥

This extension adds a variety of filters that you can apply to any YouTube video. In just a few clicks, you can adjust the image using the convenient sliders in the pop-up window.

âœ¨ **Available filters:** âœ¨

ğŸŒ€ **Blur**: Soften or blur the image.
ğŸŒ **Brightness**: Brighten or darken the displayed video.
ğŸ¨ **Contrast**: Increase or decrease the contrast to bring out details.
âš« **Grayscale**: Turn the video into black and white.
ğŸŒˆ **Hue-rotate**: Change the colors of the video by rotating the colors.
ğŸ”„ **Invert**: Invert the colors to create a negative effect.
âšª **Opacity**: Change the level of transparency.
ğŸ¨ **Saturation**: Increase the intensity of colors or make them more muted.
ğŸ§¡ **Sepia**: Add a warm, sepia tint to the video.

The operation is very intuitive â€“ you can adjust the filters using sliders directly in the pop-up, allowing you to quickly adjust the appearance of the video to your preferences.

ğŸ”§ **Features:** ğŸ”§

âš¡ **Lightweight and fast** real-time filter handling.
ğŸ›ï¸ **Intuitive sliders** to instantly adjust the effects.
ğŸ†™ **Restore default settings** with one click.
âŒ **Ability to disable** the extension at any time.
ğŸ¥ **Full control** over the appearance of any YouTube video!
ğŸ¯ **Perfect tool** for people who want to customize their YouTube video viewing experience.

â—**Disclaimer:** All product and company names are trademarks or registered trademarks of their respective holders. This extension holds no association or affiliation with them or any third-party companies.â—
